navbar_title: How far can Public transport get you?
navbar_describtion: Select a starting station, decide your timelimit in minutes and your start time:
popup_text: This online tool allows you to quickly and easily select different locations/stops and then see in an intuitive visualization how well the station is connected to the public transport network and how far you can travel in a self-selected period of time. To do this, first select a start station in the input field at the top left, then a time limit and a start time. Now click on Start search and wait a moment.
